237 class ReconstructionAssembler {
238 
239 public:
240  enum ReconstructionType {
241  TYPE_CONSTRAINT,
242  TYPE_LEAST_SQUARE
243  };
244 
245  ReconstructionAssembler();
246  ReconstructionAssembler(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions);
247 
248  void swap(ReconstructionAssembler &other) noexcept;
249 
250  void initialize(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, bool release = true);
251  void clear(bool release = true);
252 
253  uint8_t getDegree() const;
254  uint8_t getDimensions() const;
255 
256  uint16_t getCoefficientCount() const;
257 
258  int countConstraints() const;
259  int countLeastSquares() const;
260  int countEquations() const;
261 
262  void addPointValueEquation(ReconstructionType type, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, const std::array<double, 3> &point, double scaleFactor = 1.);
263  void addPointDerivativeEquation(ReconstructionType type, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, const std::array<double, 3> &point, const std::array<double, 3> &direction, double scaleFactor = 1.);
264  void addCellAverageEquation(ReconstructionType type, const Cell &cell, const std::array<double, 3> &origin, const std::array<double, 3> *vertexCoords, double scaleFactor = 1.);
265 
266  void assembleKernel(ReconstructionKernel *kernel) const;
267 
268  void updateKernel(ReconstructionKernel *kernel) const;
269 
270 private:
271  static double SVD_ZERO_THRESHOLD;
272 
273  uint8_t m_degree;
274  uint8_t m_dimensions;
275 
276  uint16_t m_nCoeffs;
277 
278  std::vector<int> m_constraintsOrder;
279  std::vector<int> m_leastSquaresOrder;
280 
281  std::vector<double> m_leastSquaresScaleFactors;
282 
283  std::vector<double> m_A;
284  std::vector<double> m_C;
285 
286  mutable std::vector<double> m_sigma;
287  mutable std::vector<double> m_U;
288  mutable std::vector<double> m_S;
289  mutable std::vector<double> m_Vt;
290  mutable std::vector<double> m_SVDWorkspace;
291  mutable std::vector<double> m_w;
292 
293  double * _addEquation(ReconstructionType type, double scaleFactor);
294 
295  void computePseudoInverse(int m, int n, double tolerance, double *A) const;
296 
297 };

299 class Reconstruction : public ReconstructionKernel, public ReconstructionAssembler {
300 
301 public:
302  Reconstruction(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions);
303 
304  void swap(Reconstruction &other) noexcept;
305 
306  void initialize(uint8_t degree, uint8_t dimensions, bool release = true);
307  void clear(bool release = true);
308 
309  using ReconstructionAssembler::getDegree;
310  using ReconstructionAssembler::getDimensions;
311 
312  using ReconstructionAssembler::getCoefficientCount;
313 
314  void assemble();
315 
316 };
